text: jo log khuda aur roze aakherat par eemaan rakhate hain tum unako khuda aur usake rasool ke dushmanon se dostee karate hue na dekhoge agarache vah unake baap ya bete ya bhaee ya khaanadaan hee ke log (kyon na hon) yahee vah log hain jinake dilon mein khuda ne eemaan ko saabit kar diya hai aur khaas apane noor se unakee taeed kee hai aur unako (behisht mein) un (hare bhare) baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche nahare jaaree hai (aur vah) hamesh usamen rahenge khuda unase raazee aur vah khuda se khush yahee khuda ka giroh hai sun rakho ki khuda ke girog ke log dilee muraaden paenge
